issue.title: [Python] pandas.RangeIndex._start/_stop/_step are deprecated
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5606](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5606). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are public attributes added RangeIndex.start/stop/step, and the private `_start/_stop/_step` are deprecated. See https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/26581

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5606?focusedCommentId=16865762) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4572
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4572>
